column4: hello. I am trying out linux due to a university course and want to set up a linux network. How can I get the individual workstations to do centralized authentication? Any pointers?
See Samba (smb) it can be configured like a Windows domain server for central authentication
is that all there is? Using Samba will permit to use wins and linux together on a network, what about 'pure linux' options?
It is pure linux, Samba implements the protocols needed to do it
